### Awards

    automate mortgage loans appraisal and approval process.
2.  **2021** **rstudio::global (2021) Diversity Scholarship** -
    Recipient of the Diversity Scholarship at the RStudio Global
    conference focused on RStudio products and the R language for
    Statistical computing.
3.  **2020 First the first Business Intelligence & Analytics Lead** at
    Entrepreneurs Financial Centre
4.  **2020 Google Africa Developer Scholarship Recipient** - pursued the
    Google Cloud Engineer certification
5.  **2019 Rookie of the Year at Entrepreneurs Financial Centre** -- For
    developing an innovative solution in the first year of joining the
    company
6.  2019 Financial Aid to pursue **Financial Regulation in Emerging
